entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
